legislation: Criminal Justice Act 2003 (Conditional Cautions: Code of Practice) Order 2009 Crime and Disorder Act 1998 (Youth Conditional Cautions: Code of Practice) Order 2009
description: Letter dated 22/10/2009 from Lord Bach to Baroness Seccombe regarding draft orders introducing the revised code of practice for conditional cautioning and the code of practice for the youth conditional cautioning. 2 p.
